# Admin & Profile Management

Tasks:
- Add endpoints to view/edit/delete admin profiles.
- Add CRUD for student records (create/read/update/delete).
- Add simple UI pages or API docs for admin operations.

Acceptance criteria:
- Admins can manage profiles via protected endpoints.
- Student records persisted in DB.
